title: Does the Tax Reform Bill 2017 help private schools and damaged public schools?
subtitle: The legislation grants tax exemptions to families with children in private schools, with the elimination of government and local tax cuts that finance public schools.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Tax Reform Bill 2017 abolishes personal cuts in government and local taxes (primary sources of funding for public schools), while tax exemptions are provided to parents who send their children to private schools.
